Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry /opt/bin//pinentry
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry-tty /opt/bin//pinentry-tty
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry-curses /opt/bin//pinentry-curses
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//info
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/share/info/pinentry.info /opt/share//info/pinentry.info
